name: Death and the Fly
description: Players will control two very different characters, Death and the Fly. Each character has special skills that must be used to navigate the many traps and puzzles contained in each level. With many interesting ways to die and numerous opponents to face, the player will be challenged and entertained for hours.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, Win7Processor: Pentium 4, 2.6 GHzMemory: 768 MB RAMGraphics: OpenGL 1.3 Compatible with 128 MB RAMHard Drive: 360 MB Space FreeSound: OpenAl compatible

reviews.review_text: I am in love with the style of the game, but i keep getting stuck. And now i cant even proceed any further. Friends tried to help but even they cannot find the way i should continue.. 'sigh'
